Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.ui.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
Represents the main menu of the application, providing options to start the game, open the settings, or exit the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Controller
    controller
    The controller that manages the application's main logic and state transitions.
    private final javafx.scene.Group
    root
    The root group that contains all the UI elements of the main menu.
    private final javafx.scene.Scene
    scene
    The scene associated with the main menu, displayed on the stage.

  • Field Details

    • controller

      private final Controller controller
      The controller that manages the application's main logic and state transitions.

    • root

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu(Controller controller)
      Constructs the MainMenu with the given controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller used to manage the main menu's actions and settings.

  • Method Details

    • initializeUI

      private void initializeUI()
      Initializes the user interface for the main menu. Sets the background image and creates buttons for starting the game, accessing settings, and exiting the game.

    • createButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button createButton(String text, Runnable action)
      Creates a styled button with specified text and action.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the button.
      action - the action to execute when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      the created Button instance.

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Gets the scene associated with the main menu.
      Returns:
      the Scene instance representing the main menu.
